server.description: configures whether to run the development server or the production server.

service_name.description: The name of the service, such as 'apps', 'jobs', etc.

service_password.description: The password for the service; used when calling the Tokens API to generate a service token. NOTE: not all services have a service password (e.g., Tokens does not) so it is not a required properyy.

log_level.description: the logging level to use for the service.

python_framework_type.description: The type of python framework the service is written with. Used to configure the thread local, request object and other bits specific to the framework.

show_traceback.description: Whether to show a full traceback when an exception occurs; should be false in production.

version.description: The version string for the service, e.g., '3.24.1'.

log_file.description: Location of log file. If not set, STDOUT will be used.

log_filing_strategy.description: Either all logs to one file (combined) or to split files (split). If no log file specified, STDOUT will still be used.

primary_site_admin_tenant_base_url.description: Base URL for the admin tenant of the primary site for this Tapis installation. This URL will be used at service initiailization, for retrieving sites and tenants data.

service_site_id.description: The site_id for the site where this service runs.

service_tenant_id.description: The tenant_id for the tenant where this service lives.

tenants.description: The list of tenants that this service will serve requests for.

use_sk.description: Whether this service should use an external Tapis Security Kernel for its auth. NOTE: This should always be TRUE in production

use_tenants.description: Whether this service should use an external Tapis Tenants API for retrieving the tenant registry. NOTE: This should always be TRUE in production

dev_jwt_public_key.description: The public key associated with the private key to use for signing JWTs in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_request_url.description: Requests coming from this request url will be directed to dev tenant and resources. For development use when not going through proper router.

dev_base_url.description: The base URL to use for the dev tenant in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_token_service.description: The URL to the token service to use for the dev tenant in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_authenticator.description: The URL to the authenticator to use for the dev tenant in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_security_kernel.description: The URL to the SK to use for the dev tenant in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_is_owned_by_associate_site.description: Whether the dev tenant in dev mode is owned by an A.S. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_allowable_x_tenant_ids.description: List of x_allowable_tenant_ids for the dev tenant in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_iss.description: The URL to use for the 'iss' claim in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

^.*_log_level.description: the logging level to use for a specific module.

^.*_log_file.description: Location of specific module log file. If not used, global log file will be used.
